attributes.action: Move the Easter and May Bank Holidays to later in 2020 after social distancing
attributes.additional_details: As social distancing is being enforced by the Government, businesses and society cannot benefit from the Bank Holidays. So I propose we move them to when people can utilise the days off work.
attributes.background: Move the 10th/13th April and 8th/25th May Bank Holidays to later in 2020 when there is no Coronavirus risk.
